titles.title: A concurrent resolution to authorize the printing of "U.S. Senator Robert C. Byrd's Addresses on the History of the United States Senate: Bicentennial Edition."

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the printing of "U.S. Senator Robert C. Byrd's Addresses on the History of the United States Senate: Bicentennial Edition" as a Senate document. Authorizes the printing of 5,000 additional copies for use by the Secretary of the Senate.
